info.name: ID Verification API
info.description: Complete API collection for ID verification service with JWT authentication, partner management, admin portal, and team management

variable.description: Partner API key for direct verification API access

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy. No authentication required.

Register a new user account.

**Required Fields:**
- username (min 3 characters)
- password (min 6 characters)

**Optional Fields:**
- email (must be valid email format)
- role (ADMIN, USER, or API_CLIENT - defaults to USER)
Login to get JWT authentication token. The token will be automatically saved and used for subsequent requests.

item.name: Admin

request.description: Admin login to get JWT token. Token is automatically saved to adminToken variable.
Register a new admin account. Consider protecting this endpoint in production.
Get the current admin's profile information.
Update the current admin's profile information.
Change the current admin's password.
Get dashboard statistics including verification counts, partner stats, etc.
Get a list of all partners.
Create a new partner account.
Get a specific partner by ID.
Update a partner's information.
Delete a partner.
Toggle a partner's active/inactive status.
Reset a partner's API key.
Get all verifications across all partners.
Get a specific verification by ID.
Manually pass a verification.
Manually fail a verification.
Resend verification email to the user.
Update verification details.
Reset or update the verification retry count.

item.description: Admin portal endpoints - require admin authentication

request.description: Register a new partner account.
Partner login to get JWT token. Token is automatically saved to partnerToken variable.
Request a password reset email.
Reset password using the token from the reset email.
Get available partner tiers and their features.
Get public information about a partner (e.g., for branding on verification page).
Get the current partner's profile information.
Update the current partner's profile information.
Change the current partner's password.
Upload a company logo for branding.
Request to upgrade to a higher tier.
Get usage statistics for the current billing period.
Get all verifications for the current partner.
Get a specific verification by ID.
Request a new verification for a user.
Resend the verification email to the user.
Update verification details before submission.
Reset the verification retry count to allow user to retry.

item.name: Team

request.description: Get information about a team invitation using the invitation token.
Accept a team invitation and create an account.
Get all team members for the current partner.
Get available team member roles.
Toggle a team member's active/inactive status.
Update a team member's role.
Send an invitation to join the team.
Resend an invitation email.
Cancel a pending invitation.

item.description: Team management endpoints - require partner authentication

item.name: Verifications (API)

request.description:
Create a new verification session. Types: IDENTITY, DOCUMENT_ONLY, SELFIE_ONLY, FULL_KYC

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

Retrieve verification details and current status.

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

formdata.description: Types: DRIVERS_LICENSE, PASSPORT, NATIONAL_ID, RESIDENCE_PERMIT, VOTER_ID, OTHER

request.description:
Upload the front side of an ID document. The API will extract data using OCR.

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

formdata.description: Upload back side of ID document (JPEG/PNG)

request.description:
Upload the back side of an ID document (if applicable).

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

Upload a selfie photo for biometric verification and face matching.

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

Compare face from ID document with selfie photo.

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

Submit the verification for final processing and decision.

**Requires API key in X-API-Key header.**

item.description: Direct verification API endpoints - require API key authentication (X-API-Key header)
